Key Match Events: Chris Jordan took a hat-trick, dismissing three U.S. batsmen in consecutive balls
Post-Match Reflections: U.S. captain Aaron Jones reflected on the team's performance and back-to-back defeats
Miscellaneous Highlights: The U.S. qualified for the Super Eights and will automatically be part of the next T20 World Cup
Others: Cricket is gaining popularity in the U.S., with terms like googly and cow corner mentioned
